TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HostServices extends System.Object

summary.span: 實作主機服務，以促成從建置存取主機。

span.span: Implementation of a host service that mediates access from the build to the host.

span.span: Creates a host service.

span.span: The name of the project file.
The name of the target.

param.name: taskName
param.span: 與主機服務相關聯的工作名稱。

span.span: The task name associated with the host service.

summary.span: 取得指定之工作的主機服務，而此工作會顯示在有指定之名稱的目標和專案中。

span.span: Gets the host service for the given task where the task appears within a target and project with the given names.

returns.span: 傳回指定之工作的主機服務，而此工作會顯示在具指定之名稱的目標和專案中。

span.span: Returns the host service for the given task where the task appears within a target and project with the given names.

returns.span: 如果沒有主機服務存在，則傳回 Null。

span.span: If no host service exists, returns null.

span.span: The current path to the project file.
The new path to the project file.

summary.span: 命名或重新命名專案後，更新主機服務表格。

span.span: Updates the host services table when a project is named or renamed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 專案名稱為時就會提供給新的完整路徑，且舊的路徑為 null。A project is named when it is given a new full path and the old path is null.

summary.span: 針對指定的工作/目標配對，註冊主機服務。

span.span: Register a host service for the given task/target pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會覆寫任何現有的主機服務。Overwrites any existing host service.

param.name: projectFile

span.span: The project file.

param.span: 如果設定為 String.Empty，則所有專案會使用指定的節點親和性。

span.span: If set to String.Empty, all projects will use the given node affinity.

param.span: 如果設定為 Null，將會清除所有的節點親和性。

span.span: If set to null, all node affinities will be cleared.
The node affinity.

summary.span: 移除註冊專案的主機物件 (如果有的話)，並移除任何與它相關聯的節點親和性。

span.span: Unregister the project's host objects, if any and remove any node affinities associated with it.
